minified_css:
body{text-align:center;font-family:-apple-system,BlinkMacSystemFont,Helvetica Neue,PingFang SC,Microsoft YaHei,Source Han Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,WenQuanYi Micro Hei,sans-serif}a{text-decoration:none}img.logo{vertical-align:middle}.notice{font-weight:700;font-size:1.2em}a.link{color:#00a1d6}a.link.hidden{color:inherit}a.link:hover{color:#00b5e5}div#footer-container{bottom:0}div#footer-container p{color:#999}
div.button-container{margin:0 auto;max-width:300px}div.button-container p{margin-block-start:.8em;margin-block-end:.8em}div.detail-container{display:none}div.detail-container p{margin-block-start:.6em;margin-block-end:.6em}a.button{cursor:pointer;display:inline-block;width:100%;border-radius:5px;line-height:2.4;font-size:1.2em;color:#fff;background-color:#00a1d6}a.button-detail{font-size:1.1em;border:1px solid #00a1d6;color:#00a1d6;background-color:#fff}a.button-nolink{cursor:default}a.button:hover{color:#fff;background-color:#00b5e5}a.button-detail:hover{background-color:#00a1d6}span.text{display:inline-block;width:100%;text-align:justify;font-size:1.1em}span.text-detail-footer{font-size:1em}
head:
